name: Old-Fashioned Johnny Cake
author: EDSELS1959
summary: This is a very old time recipe. My great grandparents used to eat this in a bowl with milk on it.
directions: Preheat oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 9x9 inch baking pan
Sift cornmeal and flour together and spread thinly on a baking sheet
Bake in preheated oven until lightly brown, about 10 minutes
Raise oven temperature to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
In a large bowl, combine cornmeal mixture, salt, sugar and baking powder
Pour in shortening and milk; stir to blend
In a separate large bowl, beat egg white until stiff
In a third bowl, beat egg yolk then fold into egg white
Gently stir flour mixture into beaten egg
Bake in preheated oven for 45 to 50 minutes, until golden brown
